name: Bookmarker
description: Cross browser bookmarks, available in Chromium based devices as well as Firefox (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/multimark/) and safari

name: Image converter
description: Can be used to change images from one type to another. It also support resizing and reducing the image quality

name: BUI
description: Neumorphic UI components designed for bookmarker chrome extension

name: Quotiday
description: A task manager for breaking my tasks into small chunks: 'The quickest way to get things done.'

name: Stack select
description: For organising projects, keeping track of different tech stack and deciding which ones to use.
